author: Okogba
title: Ogwuda joins APC, accuses PDP of dividing Delta

persons.name: tare youdeowei  m r. emmanuel ogwuda

organizations.name: oshimili north local government area of delta state

text:
Home » News » Ogwuda joins APC, accuses PDP of dividing Delta Ogwuda joins APC, accuses PDP of dividing Delta On 1:19 am In News by Okogba Comments 
By Tare Youdeowei 
M r. Emmanuel Ogwuda has joined All Progressives Congress, APC, in Ward 09, Okpanam, Oshimili North Local Government Area of Delta State. 
Receiving the new entrant, APC Chairman, Oshimili North LGA, Deacon Peter Umerah, and Ward 09 Chairman, Mr. Godwin Nwalie described Ogwuda as, “a God fearing, humanitarian with love for selfless community service and poise for massive infrastructure development of the community.” 
Responding, Ogwuda took a swipe at the past and present representatives of Aniocha and Oshimili federal constituencies at the National Assembly, saying, “They have deliberately contributed to the denial of the people’s right to good living, infrastructural growth, standard education and health facilities through negligence in legislative assignments.”
